page.title: 19Parish Meetings
page.content: {Matters arising at Pembury Parish {Meeting, held in March, 1985. The meeting was to discuss matters of concern to parishioners. { Yellow lines}have been agreed for Camden Avenue, to help wiith parking problems. Many complaints had been received concerning{dogs}fouling footways. The Parish Council stated that they were quite prepared to prosecute. On the{plannng}side two applications were discussed. One was for resiting a farmhouse in the Green Belt. One a commercial development at the Royal Oak site. A small community building is to be sited here. At the end of the meeting they mentioned the plan to{video record}the paths of the by passes so they could add to the pictorial history of Pembury.This disc was completed by Kent College,Pembury.
